title: Image Manipulator

api_list.name: /ImageManipulator
api_list.description: Your one stop endpoint for applying all available transformations.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://image-manipulator.p.rapidapi.com/ImageManipulator"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "image-manipulator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://image-manipulator.p.rapidapi.com/ImageManipulator"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

print(response.json())
